message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - javax.xml.soap.*.
Comment has incorrect indentation level 0, expected is 12, indentation should be the same level as line 68.
Comment has incorrect indentation level 0, expected is 12, indentation should be the same level as line 79.
Comment has incorrect indentation level 0, expected is 12, 8, indentation should be the same level as line 81, 84.
